label: uncl3397
comment: Code specifying the status of a name.

values.label: Name given at birth
values.comment: The name of an individual assigned at birth.

values.label: Current name
values.comment: Name currently used by the person.

values.label: Previous name
values.comment: The previous name which was used but is no longer used by the person.

values.label: Original name of an entity
values.comment: Identifies the name that existed in the beginning.

values.label: Corrected name of an entity
values.comment: Identifies a name substituted for one that was wrong.

values.label: Name of an entity changed to
values.comment: Identifies a name to which a previous name was changed.
